actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend section 102 of the Act of September 21, 1944, for the purpose of authorizing the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out operations to detect, eradicate, suppress, control, or prevent or retard the spread of the water weeds hydrilla and hyacinth.

summary.text: Classifies as plant pests the water weeds hydrilla and hyacinth, and authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out operations to detect, eradicate, suppress, control them, or to prevent or retard their spread.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 102 of the Act of September 21, 1944, for the purpose of authorizing the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out operations to detect, eradicate, suppress, control, or prevent or retard the spread of the water weeds hydrilla and hyacinth.
